description:
Sweater-season coziness meets the effortless comfort of a shirt dress. Knit from a soft and sustainable jersey blend, the Highline Turtleneck dress is sure to become a fall favourite.

  • Jersey knit blends the comfort of organic cotton, with the warmth of wool, and the lightweight durability of polyester
  • 2 way mechanical stretch material is easy to get in an out of, and holds its shape
  • tentree’s goal is to construct quality apparel and ensure that ten trees are planted for every article of clothing sold
  • Standard fit with a little additional room for extra comfort
name: tentree Highline Turtleneck Dress - Women's
